casebody.data:
PINNACLE GREENBRIAR, LLC, Pinnacle Novi, LLC, Pinnacle Orion, LLC, Pinnacle Rochester, LLC, Pinnacle Red Run Development, LLC, Pinnacle Bogie Lake, LLC, Pinnacle Birkdale Point, LLC, Pinnacle Kirkway, LLC, and Birkdale Point Investors, LLC, Petitioners-Appellants,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF TREASURY, Respondent-Appellee. SC: 158574
COA: 340646 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 18, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Michigan Realtors and the Home Builders Association of Michigan to participate as amicus curiae and to file a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on January 16, 2019, is accepted as timely filed.
